Isonet¶

isonet¶

isonet [OPTIONS] [INPUT_PATHS]...

Options

-o, --output_path <output_path>¶
-s, --slicing <slicing>¶

dataset slice (TZYX), e.g. [0:5] (first five stacks) [:,0:100] (cropping in z)

-st, --store <store>¶

Zarr store: ‘dir’, ‘ndir’, or ‘zip’

Default

dir

-z, --codec <codec>¶

compression codec: ‘zstd’, ‘blosclz’, ‘lz4’, ‘lz4hc’, ‘zlib’ or ‘snappy’

Default

zstd

-l, --clevel <clevel>¶

Compression level

Default

3

-w, --overwrite¶

to force overwrite of target

Default

False

-c, --context <context>¶

IsoNet context name

Default

default

-m, --mode <mode>¶

mode: ‘pta’ -> prepare, train and apply, ‘a’ just apply

Default

pta

-e, --max_epochs <max_epochs>¶

to force overwrite of target

Default

50

-ck, --check <check>¶

Checking integrity of written file.

Default

True

Arguments

INPUT_PATHS¶

Optional argument(s)
